smart_goals.description: By the end of the year, I want to lose 10 pounds to reduce my risk of diabetes complications.
I will walk for 30 minutes, 5 days a week to improve my cardiovascular health.
I will monitor my blood sugar levels daily and keep a record of my readings.
I will eat a balanced diet with plenty of fruits, vegetables, and whole grains to manage my blood sugar levels.
I will take my diabetes medication as prescribed and schedule regular check-ups with my healthcare provider.
